Title: Cyrus
Plot: With John's social life at a standstill and his ex-wife about to get remarried, a down on his luck divorcé finally meets the woman of his dreams, only to discover she has another man in her life - her son. Still single seven years after the breakup of his marriage, John has all but given up on romance. But at the urging of his ex-wife and best friend Jamie, John grudgingly agrees to join her and her fiancé Tim at a party. To his and everyone else's surprise, he actually manages to meet someone: the gorgeous and spirited Molly. Their chemistry is immediate. The relationship takes off quickly but Molly is oddly reluctant to take the relationship beyond John's house. Perplexed, he follows her home and discovers the other man in Molly's life: her son, Cyrus. A 21-year-old new age musician, Cyrus is his mom's best friend and shares an unconventional relationship with her. Cyrus will go to any lengths to protect Molly and is definitely not ready to share her with anyone, especially John. ...
Stars: John C. Reilly, Marisa Tomei, Jonah Hill, Catherine Keener
Companies: Dune Entertainment III, Dune Entertainment, Fox Searchlight Pictures
Tagline: John met the woman of his dreams. Then he met her son ...

Similars.Title: Jeff, Who Lives at Home
Similars.Plot: Dispatched from his basement room on an errand for his widowed mother, slacker Jeff might discover his destiny (finally) when he spends the day with his unhappily married brother as he tracks his possibly adulterous wife.
Similars.Stars: Jason Segel, Ed Helms, Judy Greer

Similars.Title: The Puffy Chair
Similars.Plot: Josh Sagers drives cross-country on a mission to deliver his father's birthday gift - a giant purple LazyBoy.
Similars.Stars: Mark Duplass, Katie Aselton, Rhett Wilkins

Similars.Title: Cedar Rapids
Similars.Plot: Tim Lippe has no idea what he's in for when he's sent to Cedar Rapids, Iowa to represent his company at an annual insurance convention, where he soon finds himself under the "guidance" of three convention veterans.
Similars.Stars: Ed Helms, John C. Reilly, Anne Heche

Similars.Title: The Sitter
Similars.Plot: A college student on suspension is coaxed into babysitting the kids next door, though he is fully unprepared for the wild night ahead of him.
Similars.Stars: Jonah Hill, Ari Graynor, Sam Rockwell

Similars.Title: The Do-Deca-Pentathlon
Similars.Plot: Two brothers compete in their own private 25-event Olympics.
Similars.Stars: Mark Kelly, Steve Zissis, Jennifer Lafleur

Similars.Title: Baghead
Similars.Plot: 4 "actors" go to a cabin in the woods for the weekend to write a movie script. They talk about a relationship movie or a paper bag over the head movie. It starts with an anonymous baghead and slowly escalates.
Similars.Stars: Ross Partridge, Steve Zissis, Greta Gerwig

Similars.Title: Funny People
Similars.Plot: When seasoned comedian George Simmons learns of his terminal, inoperable health condition, his desire to form a genuine friendship causes him to take a relatively green performer under his wing as his opening act.
Similars.Stars: Adam Sandler, Seth Rogen, Leslie Mann

Similars.Title: Greenberg
Similars.Plot: A man from Los Angeles, who moved to New York years ago, returns to L.A. to figure out his life while he house-sits for his brother. He soon sparks with his brother's assistant.
Similars.Stars: Ben Stiller, Greta Gerwig, Jennifer Jason Leigh

Similars.Title: Get Him to the Greek
Similars.Plot: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater.
Similars.Stars: Jonah Hill, Russell Brand, Elisabeth Moss

Similars.Title: The Watch
Similars.Plot: Four men who form a neighborhood watch group as a way to get out of their day-to-day family routines find themselves defending the Earth from an alien invasion.
Similars.Stars: Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn, Jonah Hill

Similars.Title: Scrapple
Similars.Plot: Amy and Rick are playing a nice game of scrabble. Rick however, has an overwhelming feeling of superiority. Losing is out of the question.

Similars.Title: Everything Must Go
Similars.Plot: When an alcoholic relapses, causing him to lose his wife and his job, he holds a yard sale on his front lawn in an attempt to start over. A new neighbor might be the key to his return to form.
Similars.Stars: Will Ferrell, Rebecca Hall, Christopher Jordan Wallace
